text: Nii gè pɛtɛni ná ɠɛni ga, siɠigi ɠakuni GALA sei ʋɛlɛi ma lɛkpɛmaʋɛti pɛ. Seeli kpakui ɠɛni zoni zea, nii sɔligi ɠɛni ga zeezakpa lɔzita. Zeezakpai ɠilagilagi ɠoozani ga zeelo gila é leʋe zeezakpa wɔlɔmai ʋa. É pɛlɛi ɠogi ɠɔɠɔni, naa ɠɛ ga seeli kpaku ɠila, ta sɔligi ɠɛ ga seeli kpaku ɠila.
